params._assetUniverse: Optional asset universe policy; zero address means use `_targetTokens`.
params._driftThresholdBps: Minimum drift required before rebalance is allowed.
params._feedRegistry: Token feed registry used for pricing.
params._targetsBps: Target weights in basis points, sum must equal 10_000.

params.safe: Safe address whose balances are used for simulation.

returns._1: Encoded failure payload when validation fails.

constructor.notice: Initializes static allocation targets and supported universe.

explainFailure(bytes).notice: Decodes policy failure payload into a human-readable reason.

getAllTargets().notice: Returns target allocations for all tracked tokens.

validate(address,(string,address,uint256.notice: Validates that a trade batch moves portfolio within allocation bounds.
